citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:15 PM on
18-Jan-17.
Spoke with the licensee via cell phone. The licensee was unavailable due to a previously scheduled appointment.
The licensee will send me a list of scheduled appointments via email to avoid those dates.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:15 PM on
18-Jan-17.
Spoke with the licensee via cell phone.  The licensee was unavailable due to a previously scheduled appointment. 
The licensee will send me a list of scheduled appointments via email to avoid those dates.
